snippet.title: MOTHER 3 HACK: OPPOSING FORCE TRAILER
snippet.description:
The mod for MOTHER 3 where you play from the Pigmask point-of-view. It encompasses Chapters 4-7. Features include but aren't limited to:
- 6 New Party Members
- New Equipment
- New Enemies
- New Dialogue
- New Scenarios
- New Skills

Link: https://mother4ever.net/mother-3-opposing-force/

DISCLAIMER: Nothing final. Pigmask names very not final.


CREDITS:

Sam the Salmon for creating the logo
Yosuke and Lorenzooone for programming assistance
snowwood for importing some graphics
Spike for ideas, including creating the Pork Roaster
Falcon for concept art
Milky and Sgt. Headcrab for title mockups
Irikachana for the A Tiny Enormous Miracle restoration
Fourside for the Lucas sprite
MemoriiMakiko for the Kumatora and Duster sprites
spiderfreak1011 for some resources
...and Jeffman for some of the hacking tools, along with the entire fan translation team
